snippet: The venerable beverage company is repositioning its Web site as a consumer magazine called Coca-Cola Journey.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column notes that Coca-Cola is repositioning its corporate Web site as online consumer magazine called Coca-Cola Journey; reorganized site will offer interviews, opinion columns, video and audio clips, photo galleries and blogs on various subjects, augmenting its traditional business-oriented content.
lead_paragraph: The venerable beverage company is repositioning its Web site as a consumer magazine called Coca-Cola Journey.

headline.seo: Coke Revamps Web Site to Tell Its Story
headline.main: Coke Revamps Web Site to Tell Its Story
headline.print_headline: Coke Revamps Web Site to Tell Its Story
